CharacterPopup.Name: Recruit
CharacterPopup.Description: Know someone who'd be a perfect fit? Recruit them.

CharacterPopup.Name: Orphila
CharacterPopup.Description: A confident and assertive woman who is a non believer. She is the Captain of the Ship called JUPITER.

CharacterPopup.Name: Salazar
CharacterPopup.Description: A cunning and educated man who worships the Seeker and the Magician. He is a Journalist who is looking for something to write on his next “Big Hit”.
